Class ContactsApp

java.lang.Object
ContactsApp
public class ContactsApp extends Object
The ContactsApp class is the main class of the app. Main functions are here, for example loop for the control panel and different methods.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    CreateContact()
    CreateContact method creates a new contact based on user input.
    static void
    DisplayAllContacts()
    DisplayAllContacts method displays all contacts, it loops through the existing arraylist.
    static void
    LoadFile()
    LoadFile method is used to load contact info from the file, so the data doesn't disappear when the app shuts down and is started again.

    static void
    PrintContact(int index, Contact contact)
    This method prints the existing contact info and index.
    static void
    RemoveContact()
    RemoveContact method removes a contact object, user will input details that determine which contact will be deleted.
    static void
    SaveFile()
    SaveFile method saves the arraylist (contacts to a csv-file).

    UpdateContact method is used to update a contact which already exists.

    • ContactsApp

      public ContactsApp()

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)

    • CreateContact

      public static void CreateContact()
      CreateContact method creates a new contact based on user input. Validation methods are called, making sure that the userinput is validated.

    • RemoveContact

      public static void RemoveContact()
      RemoveContact method removes a contact object, user will input details that determine which contact will be deleted. User input is validated.

    • UpdateContact

      public static void UpdateContact()
      UpdateContact method is used to update a contact which already exists. Index and new contact information is asked. Information is validated.

    • DisplayAllContacts

      public static void DisplayAllContacts()
      DisplayAllContacts method displays all contacts, it loops through the existing arraylist.

    • PrintContact

      public static void PrintContact(int index, Contact contact)
      This method prints the existing contact info and index.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the given contact object from the DisplayAllContacts method.
      contact - given object from the DisplayAllContacts method.

    • SaveFile

      public static void SaveFile()
      SaveFile method saves the arraylist (contacts to a csv-file).

    • LoadFile

      public static void LoadFile()
      LoadFile method is used to load contact info from the file, so the data doesn't disappear when the app shuts down and is started again.
